resources.string: Not connected to Wifi network, cannot enable ADB over Wifi

Missing WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission, cannot enable ADB Wifi; manually connect to ADB and run the following command:

adb shell "pm grant dev.coletz.adbwifi android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS"

(tap this message to copy it).

Once done restart this application
This channel is used only to notify if WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission is missing, causing the impossibility of toggling ADB Wifi
